explanation: [0-0] Inside a room, a young man with curly hair, wearing a dark gray baseball cap and a khaki T-shirt, stands in a room paved with beige tiles. Behind him is a yellow wooden door. The man in the khaki T-shirt is holding a black object in his left hand. He is sideways, with his mouth open and eyes looking to the left of the screen. At this moment, there is a line of yellow subtitles in black font at the top of the screen.

[0-2] The man with the dark gray baseball cap opens his mouth, turns around, and throws the small black bag in his hand to the right of the screen. Then he moves his hands, turns his head to look to the left of the screen, and raises his hands to point to the front left of the screen.

[2-6] Then the camera cuts and the scene changes. A curly-haired man in a khaki T-shirt reaches out to catch a small black bag thrown from in front of him. After glancing in the direction the bag was thrown from, the curly-haired man in the khaki T-shirt holds the black bag in his left hand and passes it to his left front.
